episodes.title: Psychedelics and cults with Dr Steve Hassan and Jules Evans
episodes.description:
Recording of an online seminar organized by the Challenging Psychedelic Experiences Project April 17 2024, featuring cult expert Dr Steve Hassan and Jules Evans, director of the Challenging Psychedelic Experiences Project. How can toxic high control groups manipulate and coerce us, and how can they use psychedelic drugs for this purpose? How can we spot the signs a community might be toxic, and how can we stop our community or church from becoming a cult? And how do we support loved ones who we think have got stuck in a cult (psychedelic or otherwise). 
Dr Hassan's organization is https://freedomofmind.com/
Jules writes at www.ecstaticintegration.org
